quotes.quote:
there is a place in the heart that
will never be filled

a space

and even during the
best moments
and
the greatest times
times

we will know it

we will know it
more than
ever

there is a place in the heart that
will never be filled
and

we will wait
and
wait

in that space.
quotes.author: Charles bukowski

quotes.quote: You’ll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
quotes.book: I Can Read With My Eyes Shut!

quotes.quote: We can't be afraid of change. You may feel very secure in the pond that you are in, but if you never venture out of it, you will never know that there is such a thing as an ocean, a sea. Holding onto something that is good for you now, may be the very reason why you don't have something better.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Stories you read when you're the right age never quite leave you. You may forget who wrote them or what the story was called. Sometimes you'll forget precisely what happened, but if a story touches you it will stay with you, haunting the places in your mind that you rarely ever visit.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: If no one cares for you at all, do you even really exist?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: You forget what you want to remember, and you remember what you want to forget.
quotes.author: Cormac McCarthy

quotes.quote: Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: The thing that makes you exceptional, if you are at all, is inevitably that which must also make you lonely.
quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

quotes.quote: There is more than one way to burn a book. And the world is full of people running about with lit matches.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: I know it's wrong - God, it's all kinds of wrong - but I just want to lie down with you and wake up with you, just once, just once ever in my life.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Life is a mirror: if you frown at it, it frowns back; if you smile, it returns the greeting.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: What draws people to be friends is that they see the same truth. They share it.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Fire-breathing bitch-queen.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: There is nothing like looking, if you want to find something. You certainly usually find something, if you look, but it is not always quite the something you were after.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Do not train a child to learn by force or harshness; but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Now that she had nothing to lose, she was free.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: And Lot's wife, of course, was told not to look back where all those people and their homes had been. But she did look back, and I love her for that, because it was so human. So she was turned into a pillar of salt. So it goes.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote:
Gus: "It tastes like..."
Me: "Food."
Gus: "Yes, precisely. It tastes like food, excellently prepared. But it does not taste, how do I put this delicately...?"
Me: "It does not taste like God Himself cooked heaven into a series of five dishes which were then served to you accompanied by several luminous balls of fermented, bubbly plasma while actual and literal flower petals floated down around your canal-side dinner table."
Gus: "Nicely phrased."
Gus's father: "Our children are weird."
My dad: "Nicely phrased.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Some things in life are out of your control. You can make it a party or a tragedy.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: We dream in our waking moments, and walk in our sleep.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: There will be a few times in your life when all your instincts will tell you to do something, something that defies logic, upsets your plans, and may seem crazy to others. When that happens, you do it. Listen to your instincts and ignore everything else. Ignore logic, ignore the odds, ignore the complications, and just go for it.
quotes.author: Judith McNaught

quotes.quote: If you stay, I'll do whatever you want. I'll quit the band, go with you to New York. But if you need me to go away, I'll do that, too. I was talking to Liz and she said maybe coming back to your old life would be too painful, that maybe it'd be easier for you to erase us. And that would suck, but I'd do it. I can lose you like that if I don't lose you today. I'll let you go. If you stay.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that's it.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: It is not the length of life, but the depth.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote:
Jane, be still; don't struggle so like a wild, frantic bird, that is rending its own plumage in its desperation."
"I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being, with an independent will; which I now exert to leave you.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: You believe in a book that has talking animals, wizards, witches, demons, sticks turning into snakes, burning bushes, food falling from the sky, people walking on water, and all sorts of magical, absurd and primitive stories, and you say that we are the ones that need help?
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If there's one thing I've learned, it's this: We all want everything to be okay. We don't even wish so much for fantastic or marvelous or outstanding. We will happily settle for okay, because most of the time, okay is enough.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Women want love to be a novel. Men, a short story.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
quotes.author: Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

quotes.quote:
So light a fire!" Harry choked. "Yes...of course...but there's no wood!" ...
"HAVE YOU GONE MAD!" Ron bellowed. "ARE YOU A WITCH OR NOT!
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.book: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quotes.quote: The sunlight claps the earth, and the moonbeams kiss the sea: what are all these kissings worth, if thou kiss not me?
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: You live like this, sheltered, in a delicate world, and you believe you are living. Then you read a book… or you take a trip… and you discover that you are not living, that you are hibernating. The symptoms of hibernating are easily detectable: first, restlessness. The second symptom (when hibernating becomes dangerous and might degenerate into death): absence of pleasure. That is all. It appears like an innocuous illness. Monotony, boredom, death. Millions live like this (or die like this) without knowing it. They work in offices. They drive a car. They picnic with their families. They raise children. And then some shock treatment takes place, a person, a book, a song, and it awakens them and saves them from death. Some never awaken.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin
quotes.book: The Diary of Anaïs Nin, Vol. 1: 1931-1934

quotes.quote: I decided it is better to scream. Silence is the real crime against humanity.
quotes.author: Nadezhda Mandelstam

quotes.quote: Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote:
Will rolled up his sleeves. "We'll probably have to knock down the door--"
"Or," said Jem, reaching out and giving the knob a twist, "not."
The door swung open onto a rectangle of darkness.
"Now, that's simply laziness," said Will.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: She was a genius of sadness, immersing herself in it, separating its numerous strands, appreciating its subtle nuances. She was a prism through which sadness could be divided into its infinite spectrum.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote:
Is this the part where you start tearing off strips of your shirt to bind my wounds?"
"If you wanted me to rip my clothes off, you should have just asked.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
quotes.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

quotes.quote: Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote:
I don't want to be a man," said Jace. "I want to be an angst-ridden teenager who can't confront his own inner demons and takes it out verbally on other people instead."
"Well," said Luke, "you're doing a fantastic job.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If we find ourselves with a desire that nothing in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that we were made for another world.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult trade since it consists principally of dealings with men.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.book: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.quote: I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote:
The Road Not Taken

Two roads diverged in a yellow wood,
And sorry I could not travel both
And be one traveler, long I stood
And looked down one as far as I could
To where it bent in the undergrowth;

Then took the other, as just as fair,
And having perhaps the better claim,
Because it was grassy and wanted wear;
Though as for that the passing there
Had worn them really about the same,

And both that morning equally lay
In leaves no step had trodden black.
Oh, I kept the first for another day!
Yet knowing how way leads on to way,
I doubted if I should ever come back.

I shall be telling this with a sigh
Somewhere ages and ages hence:
Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—
I took the one less traveled by,
And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The world is not a wish-granting factory.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it--always.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Brontë

quotes.quote: There's nothing like deep breaths after laughing that hard. Nothing in the world like a sore stomach for the right reasons.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky
quotes.book: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quotes.quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Becoming fearless isn't the point. That's impossible. It's learning how to control your fear, and how to be free from it.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: I am not pretty. I am not beautiful. I am as radiant as the sun.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Let me tell you this: if you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it's not because they enjoy solitude. It's because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: It's far better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone — so far.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote:
Not everything is about you," Clary said furiously.
"Possibly," Jace said, "but you do have to admit that the majority of things are.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote:
I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.

(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is so short, forgetting is so long.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote:
Bran thought about it. 'Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?'
'That is the only time a man can be brave,' his father told him.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up. You build up all these defenses, you build up a whole suit of armor, so that nothing can hurt you, then one stupid person, no different from any other stupid person, wanders into your stupid life...You give them a piece of you. They didn't ask for it. They did something dumb one day, like kiss you or smile at you, and then your life isn't your own anymore. Love takes hostages. It gets inside you. It eats you out and leaves you crying in the darkness, so simple a phrase like 'maybe we should be just friends' turns into a glass splinter working its way into your heart. It hurts. Not just in the imagination. Not just in the mind. It's a soul-hurt, a real gets-inside-you-and-rips-you-apart pain. I hate love.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman
quotes.book: The Sandman, Vol. 9: The Kindly Ones

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I am a man" he told her, "and men do not consume pink beverages. Get thee gone woman, and bring me something brown.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I generally avoid temptation unless I can't resist it.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote:
What the hell is that?" I laughed.
"It's my fox hat."
"Your fox hat?"
"Yeah, Pudge. My fox hat."
"Why are you wearing your fox hat?" I asked.
"Because no one can catch the motherfucking fox.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I didn't want to wake up. I was having a much better time asleep. And that's really sad. It was almost like a reverse nightmare, like when you wake up from a nightmare you're so relieved. I woke up into a nightmare.
quotes.author: Ned Vizzini
quotes.book: It's Kind of a Funny Story

quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: They didn’t agree on much. In fact, they didn’t agree on anything. They fought all the time and challenged each other ever day. But despite their differences, they had one important thing in common. They were crazy about each other.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Accept who you are. Unless you're a serial killer.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Good books don't give up all their secrets at once.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: We are all different. Don’t judge, understand instead.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: I think if I've learned anything about friendship, it's to hang in, stay connected, fight for them, and let them fight for you. Don't walk away, don't be distracted, don't be too busy or tired, don't take them for granted. Friends are part of the glue that holds life and faith together. Powerful stuff.
quotes.author: Jon Katz

quotes.quote:
Is this the part where you say if I hurt her, you'll kill me?"
"No" Simon said, "If you hurt Clary she's quite capable of killing you herself. Possibly with a variety of weapons.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
Reader's Bill of Rights

1. The right to not read

2. The right to skip pages

3. The right to not finish

4. The right to reread

5. The right to read anything

6. The right to escapism

7. The right to read anywhere

8. The right to browse

9. The right to read out loud

10. The right to not defend your tastes
quotes.author: Daniel Pennac

quotes.quote: He never went out without a book under his arm, and he often came back with two.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote:
War is peace.
Freedom is slavery.
Ignorance is strength.
quotes.author: George Orwell
